generated_body: If you click on "The Real Reason McDonald's Keeps the Filet-O-Fish on Their Menu," you can expect an exploration of the strategic and business-oriented rationale behind McDonald's continued offering of this menu item. The article may discuss historical sales data, target demographics, and seasonal promotions that contribute to its persistence on the menu. Additionally, it could highlight consumer preferences and market trends that influence fast-food chains' menu decisions. Overall, the content is likely to provide insights into the broader implications of menu management in the fast-food industry.
